Header.text: SSYSTEMS MB proudly serves customers in Lithuania and its surrounding regions, providing prompt and reliable repairing solutions to homes and businesses alike. Whether you're located in the heart of the city or in the outskirts, we're here to assist you.

Experience.title: Experienced and Trusted by people
Experience.weAre: We're more than just a home repair company — we're your reliable partner for keeping your home safe, comfortable, and running smoothly. Our team of experienced technicians provides trusted repair, maintenance, and installation services for plumbing, electrical, painting, carpentry, and more.
Experience.weBelieve: We believe quality service starts with trust, clear communication, and skilled craftsmanship. Whether it's a small fix or a full renovation, we approach every project with care, efficiency, and attention to detail.
Experience.ourMission: Our mission is simple: to make home repair easy, affordable, and stress-free — so you can focus on what matters most.

OurTeam.title: Meet Our Awesome Team
OurTeam.eachMember: Each member of our team is highly skilled, experienced, and trained to handle a wide range of plumbing issues efficiently and effectively. Whether it's a simple repair or a complex installation, you can trust our team to get the job done right the first time.

OurServices.take: Take the first step towards resolving your issues by contacting us today. Our team of skilled professionals is ready to assist you with all your repairing needs.

Hero.text: SSYSTEMS MB proudly serves customers in Lithuania and its surrounding regions, providing prompt and reliable repairing solutions to homes and businesses alike. Whether you're located in the heart of the city or in the outskirts, we're here to assist you.

feature1.title: 24/7 Service
feature1.description: Day or night, our team is always ready. We're available around the clock to handle your urgent repairs whenever you need us.

feature2.title: Clear On Cost
feature2.description: We believe in honesty and clarity. That's why we give upfront quotes — so you know exactly what you're paying for.

feature3.title: Excellent Work
feature3.description: Our skilled technicians ensure every job meets the highest standards of workmanship and care.

service1.title: Sewer Line Inspection and Repair
service1.description: Our sewer line inspection and repair service utilize state-of-the-art camera inspection technology to identify issues within your sewer line quickly. Whether it's tree root intrusion, cracks, or blockages.

service2.title: Water Heater Services
service2.description: Professional water heater installation, maintenance and repair services. We ensure your system operates efficiently and reliably for consistent hot water supply.

service3.title: Marine Engineering Solutions
service3.description: When your vessel needs urgent attention, you need skilled and reliable ship repair experts.Our team provides professional marine repair and maintenance services — from hull and structural welding to engine work and system upgrades. We ensure your ship stays seaworthy, safe, and ready to perform at its best.

service4.title: Precision Welding Services
service4.description: Our team provides reliable welding and design services for all types of metal projects — from custom fabrication and repairs to industrial structures and creative designs. We deliver strong, clean, and lasting welds that bring your ideas to life with precision and quality craftsmanship.

service5.title: Quality Painting Services
service5.description: We offer professional interior and exterior painting services using high-quality materials and precise techniques. Whether it’s a single room or an entire building, we deliver smooth, vibrant, and lasting results that transform your space.

Header.title: Get Connect with Us
Header.text: SSYSTEMS MB serves customers in Lithuania and nearby areas, providing fast and reliable repair solutions for homes and businesses. Whether you’re in the city center or outskirts, we’re here to help.

Contact.reach1: Reach out to our support team for any service requests, questions, or

Header.text: We're looking for skilled, passionate, and responsible professionals who are ready to create, repair, and innovate together. At our company, every project matters — from welding and ship repair to home renovation and industrial construction.

AboutWork.title: Why Work With Us?
AboutWork.text: We believe that great results come from teamwork, respect, and dedication. Our employees are the foundation of everything we build. Whether you're a welder, engineer, or construction expert, you'll have opportunities to grow, learn, and contribute to projects that make a difference.

job1.title: Welder
job1.description: Experience with MIG, TIG, and stick welding required.

job2.title: Construction Worker
job2.description: Knowledge of modern tools and safety procedures is a must.

job3.title: Ship Repair Technician
job3.description: Work in port area; technical education preferred.

ApplicationForm.title: Submit Your Application
ApplicationForm.text: Send us your details and we'll get back to you. We're always excited to meet professionals who are passionate about what they do.
ApplicationForm.applicationSubmitted: ✅ Application submitted successfully! We'll contact you soon.

ApplicationForm.tellUs: Tell us about yourself and why you're interested in this position...

Closing.title: Together, we build not just structures — we build trust.
Closing.join: Join us in creating lasting impact through quality craftsmanship and unwavering reliability.

post1.title: How Welding Shapes Modern Industry
post1.description: Discover how precision welding defines the durability and safety of modern infrastructure.

post2.title: Inside Our Latest Ship Repair Project
post2.description: A detailed look into how our team restored a 40-meter cargo vessel with cutting-edge methods.

post3.title: Safety First: How We Keep Every Workplace Secure
post3.description: Our commitment to maintaining high safety standards across all operations.

post4.title: Revolutionizing Construction Through Technology
post4.description: Learn how automation and smart tools are transforming the construction industry.

post5.title: Meet the Team Behind Our Success
post5.description: Get to know the skilled engineers and technicians powering our best projects.

Hero.title: Building the Future — One Weld at a Time.
Hero.text: News, Tips, and Real Stories from the field — welding, construction, innovation, and teamwork shaping tomorrow’s infrastructure.
